channel.title: Golang on blog
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on blog

item.title: Golang with no Googling
item.description: I spent a good amount of time learning Golang (Go, but since using two letters in any form of a search usually is an exercise in futility). My goal was fairly simple, I wanted to display some system statistics via HTTP by reading them directly from /proc. I saw that Golang had a module in the standard library call "syscall" and I decided that it might be fun to give that a try.
